statements: SELECT * FROM debt_to_income_ratios
SELECT user_id, monthly_income FROM debt_to_income_ratios
SELECT monthly_income, monthly_debt FROM debt_to_income_ratios WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM debt_to_income_ratios WHERE monthly_debt > 500
SELECT id, user_id, monthly_income, monthly_debt FROM debt_to_income_ratios
SELECT * FROM debt_to_income_ratios WHERE monthly_income > 5000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(monthly_income) AS total_income FROM debt_to_income_ratios GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_income > 10000;
SELECT id, user_id, monthly_income, monthly_debt FROM debt_to_income_ratios WHERE monthly_income - monthly_debt > 2000;
SELECT id, monthly_income, monthly_debt FROM debt_to_income_ratios WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM debt_to_income_ratios GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_entries DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_analysis WHERE income_ratio < 0.3 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income, debt FROM customer WHERE debt > 10000 ORDER BY income DESC, debt ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, debt FROM customer ORDER BY debt DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer JOIN credit_analysis ON customer.customer_id = credit_analysis.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, income FROM customer WHERE income_ratio < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM Loan WHERE loan_status = 'active';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, f.income FROM Customer c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount + debts AS total_debt FROM Loan l JOIN FinancialData f ON l.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM Loan WHERE loan_status = 'Approved' AND interest_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT Customer.first_name, FinancialData.income FROM Customer JOIN FinancialData ON Customer.customer_id = FinancialData.customer_id WHERE FinancialData.income > 50000;

SELECT Customer.first_name, Customer.last_name, Loan.loan_amount, FinancialData.income FROM Customer JOIN Loan ON Customer.customer_id = Loan.customer_id JOIN FinancialData ON Customer.customer_id = FinancialData.customer_id WHERE Loan.loan_amount > 100000 AND FinancialData.income - FinancialData.debts > 40000 ORDER BY Loan.loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, income FROM customer WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, income FROM customer ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, loan_amount FROM customer JOIN loan ON customer.customer_id = loan.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, debt, income, dti_ratio FROM customer JOIN debt_to_income_ratio ON customer.customer_id = debt_to_income_ratio.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT loan_amount, interest_rate, loan_term FROM loan WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND interest_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer JOIN loan ON customer.customer_id = loan.customer_id WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY first_name, last_name ASC;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, loan.loan_amount, payment.payment_amount FROM customer JOIN loan ON customer.customer_id = loan.customer_id JOIN payment ON loan.loan_id = payment.loan_id WHERE payment.payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.credit_score, debt_to_income_ratio.dti_ratio FROM customer JOIN debt_to_income_ratio ON customer.customer_id = debt_to_income_ratio.customer_id WHERE customer.income > debt_to_income_ratio.income;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM Customers WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, debt FROM Customers WHERE debt < 10000;
SELECT customer_name, income, debt FROM Customers ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM Customers WHERE income > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, debt FROM Customers WHERE debt > (SELECT threshold_amount FROM DebtThresholds WHERE threshold_id='12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678') ORDER BY debt DESC;
SELECT * FROM DebtToIncomeRatios WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE income < 5000) ORDER BY debt_to_income_ratio ASC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='Credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
